entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then a few rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
